/* kr.go.bai.eip.csp.dcp.dao.CSPDCP428Mapper.selecOpmOrgList */
SELECT A.REQ_DVSN_CD ,A.ACP_YR ,A.CVPT_ACP_NO ,A.HNDL_ORG_SRNO ,A.ORG_HIS_DVSN_CD ,A.SRNO ,A.ORG_CD ,A.PUB_DVSN_CD ,F_CODE_NM('1000447',A.PUB_DVSN_CD) AS PUB_DVSN_NM ,A.COPT_SG_CD ,F_ORG_HRK_NM(A.COPT_SG_CD) AS COPT_SG_NM , F_ORG_INFO(A.ORG_CD,'1') AS ORG_NM , (SELECT AA.ONR_OPM_ORG_CD FROM TBDCMACM015M AA WHERE AA.ORG_CD = A.COPT_SG_CD || '000000000') AS OPM_ORG_CD , (SELECT AA.ONR_OPM_ORG_NM FROM TBDCMACM015M AA WHERE AA.ORG_CD = A.COPT_SG_CD || '000000000') AS OPM_ORG_NM FROM TBCSPDCP206L A WHERE A.REQ_DVSN_CD = #{reqDvsnCd} AND A.ACP_YR = #{acpYr} AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = #{cvptAcpNo} AND A.ORG_HIS_DVSN_CD IN ('2','3') ORDER BY A.ORG_CD
